title: Textile, 20th century
dimensions: H x W (Both selvages present): 67 x 54 cm (26 3/8 x 21 1/4 in.)
description: Dark blue-grey ground, fancy weave, with meander in lighter shade and small flower clusters. Reproduction of late Louis XV style; probably by machine.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 20th century.Medium: silk
Technique: fancy weave. 1967-33-1.
